inspector.description: Visualizes the disconnect between News Sentiment (X-Axis) and Option Market Fear (Y-Axis). Top-Left = Fear, Bottom-Right = Growth.
inspector.sql_logic:
SELECT 
    daily_id,
    trade_date,
    ticker,
    sentiment_signal,
    news_volume,
    sentiment_std_dev,
    high_impact_story_count,
    avg_vol_risk_premium,
    avg_iv,
    avg_rv
FROM STOCKS_ELT_DB.PREP.int_newsapi__market_news_options_joined
WHERE trade_date >= DATEADD('day', -7, CURRENT_DATE())
ORDER BY trade_date DESC, news_volume DESC
inspector.dbt_logic:
-- models/intermediate/int_newsapi__market_news_options_joined.sql

{{ config(
    materialized='incremental',
    unique_key='daily_id',
    schema='PREP',
    tags=['news', 'signal', 'joined', 'incremental']
) }}

-- 1. NEWS HISTORY
WITH history AS (
    SELECT * FROM {{ ref('int_newsapi__market_news') }}
    {% if is_incremental() %}
      WHERE published_at >= DATEADD(day, -3, (SELECT MAX(trade_date) FROM {{ this }}))
    {% endif %}
),

-- 2. CALCULATE DAILY SENTIMENT
signal_calc AS (
    SELECT
        {{ dbt_utils.generate_surrogate_key(['ticker', 'DATE(published_at)']) }} as daily_id,
        ticker,
        DATE(published_at) as trade_date,
        AVG(sentiment_score) as sentiment_signal,
        COUNT(*) as news_volume,
        STDDEV(sentiment_score) as sentiment_std_dev,
        COUNT_IF(ABS(sentiment_score) > 0.5) as high_impact_story_count
    FROM history
    GROUP BY 1, 2, 3
),

-- 3. OPTIONS DATA
options_daily AS (
    SELECT 
        trade_date,
        underlying_ticker as ticker,
        AVG(vol_risk_premium) as avg_vol_risk_premium,
        AVG(implied_volatility_calc) as avg_iv,
        AVG(realized_volatility_20d) as avg_rv
    FROM {{ ref('int_massive__stocks_options_joined') }}
    WHERE ticker_category = 'Mag 7'
    {% if is_incremental() %}
      AND trade_date >= DATEADD(day, -3, (SELECT MAX(trade_date) FROM {{ this }}))
    {% endif %}
    GROUP BY 1, 2
)

-- 4. JOIN SENTIMENT + OPTIONS
SELECT
    t1.daily_id,
    t1.trade_date,
    t1.ticker,
    t1.sentiment_signal,
    t1.news_volume,
    t1.sentiment_std_dev,
    t1.high_impact_story_count,
    t2.avg_vol_risk_premium,
    t2.avg_iv,
    t2.avg_rv
FROM signal_calc t1
LEFT JOIN options_daily t2 
    ON t1.ticker = t2.ticker 
    AND t1.trade_date = t2.trade_date
inspector.dbt_yml:
- name: int_newsapi__market_news
    description: >
      [INCREMENTAL TABLE]: The persistent history layer for Market News.
      Reads from the ephemeral Staging View and persists records to history, ensuring no duplicates.
      Contains vector embeddings for RAG applications.
    tags: ["intermediate", "news", "history", "rag", "incremental"]
    columns:
      - name: news_id
        description: "Unique Hash ID (MD5 of URL + Ticker). Primary Key."
        tests:
          - unique
          - not_null
      - name: ticker
        description: "Stock Ticker (Mag 7)."
      - name: published_at
        description: "Article publication timestamp."
      - name: title
        description: "Article headline."
      - name: summary_embedding
        description: "1536-dim vector embedding of the article summary/title."
      - name: dbt_inserted_at
        description: "Audit timestamp of when this record was added to history."

  - name: int_newsapi__market_news_options_joined
    description: >
      [INCREMENTAL TABLE]: The "Feature Store" for Sentiment Analysis.
      Joins daily aggregated News Sentiment (t1) with daily aggregated Options/Volatility metrics (t2).
      Used to analyze if Sentiment predicts Volatility.
    tags: ["intermediate", "news", "signal", "joined", "incremental"]
    columns:
      - name: daily_id
        description: "Surrogate Key: hash(ticker, trade_date)"
        tests:
          - unique
          - not_null
      - name: ticker
        description: "Stock Ticker."
      - name: trade_date
        description: "Date of the signal."
      - name: sentiment_signal
        description: "Average Sentiment Score (-1.0 to 1.0). The primary alpha signal."
      - name: news_volume
        description: "Number of articles contributing to the signal."
      - name: sentiment_std_dev
        description: "Standard Deviation of sentiment scores. High values = Mixed/Controversial news."
      - name: high_impact_story_count
        description: "Count of stories with strong sentiment (|score| > 0.5)."
      - name: avg_vol_risk_premium
        description: "Daily average Volatility Risk Premium (IV - RV)."
      - name: avg_iv
        description: "Daily average Implied Volatility."
      - name: total_options_volume
        description: "Total options contracts traded that day."
